mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_webapp_device(uuid, system, model, current_webapp_version, `name`, phone, duty, institution) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{system}, IFNULL(#{model}, ""), #{currentVer}, IFNULL(#{owner}, ""), IFNULL(#{phone}, ""), IFNULL(#{duty}, ""), IFNULL(#{institution}, "") )
mapper.update: update tbl_webapp_device set system = #{system}, model = #{model}, current_webapp_version = #{currentVer}, `name` = #{owner}, phone = #{phone}, duty = #{duty}, institution = #{institution} where id = #{id}

select id from tbl_webapp_device where uuid = #{uuid}

and `name` like CONCAT('%',#{owner},'%')

and a.uuid like CONCAT('%',#{entity.uuid},'%')

order by a.gmt_create desc, a.id desc limit #{page.startRow}, #{page.rows}

select a.id, a.uuid, a.system, a.model, a.current_webapp_version currentVer, a.name owner, a.phone, a.duty, a.institution, a.gmt_create createDate, a.gmt_modified modifyDate from tbl_webapp_device a, tbl_center_device d where a.uuid = d.uuid and d.center_id = #{centerId}

select c.id, c.`name` from tbl_webapp_device a, tbl_center_device d, tbl_center c where a.uuid = d.uuid and c.id = d.center_id and a.id = #{appdevId} ORDER BY c.id

SELECT c.id, c.`name`, t.uuid checked FROM tbl_center c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.center_id, a.uuid FROM tbl_webapp_device a, tbl_center_device d WHERE a.uuid = d.uuid AND a.id = #{appdevId} ) t ON c.id = t.center_id ORDER BY c.id
